bill.title: Relating to noncompliance with laws by public education providers.
bill.description: Requires Department of Education to investigate allegations of noncompliance with laws related to discrimination, restraint and seclusion and religious activity when department receives complaint of noncompliance or department determines there is evidence of noncompliance. Requires Department of Education to investigate allegations of noncompliance with laws related to discrimination, restraint and seclusion and religious activity when department receives complaint of noncompliance or department determines there is evidence of noncompliance. Authorizes department to order corrective action or to impose sanctions when noncompliance found.
